short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A supplemental Chrome extension for 4for4.com LeagueSync to sync ESPN leagues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LeagueSync Chrome Extension from 4for4 Fantasy Football allows LeagueSync to authenticate with ESPN. This extensions is required to sync your ESPN fantasy league on 4for4.com.
